hackathon-description-text: Join the only collegiate fashion tech hackathon!
hackathon-eligibility: Must be a university student (all majors/class levels accepted)
hackathon-requirements:
must be related to fashion AND tech. can be anything such as:
-wearable technology
-fashion industry apps, software, etc
-you can utilize hardware at the event or feel free to bring some. check out our
-KSU's
hackathon-rules:
- YOU MUST BE AT FASHION TECH HACKATHON TO WORK ON A PROJECT FOR SUBMISSION
- You cannot work on your project before the event begins
- You cannot steal another team's source code
- The decision of judges is final for determining prizes and awards
- Please comply with all instructions from fashion tech hack organizers
hackathon-description-header: Join the only collegiate fashion tech hackathon! This weekend hackathon has a focus on combining fashion and tech and creating cool products and concepts. $4,000 in cash prizes!
